unnormalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to Educational Freedom!**
normalised: scholarship portals: your ticket to educational freedom!

unnormalised: Feeling the pinch of rising tuition fees? Don't worry, yaar! Scholarship portals are here to rescue your dreams of studying at IIT Madras or even a swanky foreign uni. These online hubs are packed with info on scholarships, fellowships, and grants – think of them as digital treasure chests!
normalised: feeling the pinch of rising tuition fees? don't worry, friend! scholarship portals are here to rescue your dreams of studying at I I T Madras or even a swanky foreign university. these online hubs are packed with information on scholarships, fellowships, and grants – think of them as digital treasure chests!

unnormalised: Sites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are making it super easy for Indian students to find financial aid. Forget endless scrolling through dusty notices at 3:00 PM on 25/12/2023! These portals let you filter by your field of study, your caste category, and even your parents’ income.
normalised: sites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are making it super easy for Indian students to find financial aid. forget endless scrolling through dusty notices at three P M on twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty three! these portals let you filter by your field of study, your caste category, and even your parents’ income.

unnormalised: Many even offer support in the application process. So, if you're aiming for that MBA after cracking CAT on, say, 10/11/2024, start browsing now! You might just find that Rs. 5 Lakh scholarship you need. It's like Bhagavad Gita for your education, showing you the path to enlightenment (and a debt-free degree!). Plus, some partnerships even give scholarships for km-based travel, so you can come study with us from Gujarat to West Bengal if you wish! Don't miss the application deadline at 09:00 hrs on 01/01/2025!
normalised: many even offer support in the application process. so, if you're aiming for that M B A after cracking C A T on, say, tenth november two thousand and twenty four, start browsing now! you might just find that rupee five lakh scholarship you need. it's like Bhagavad Gita for your education, showing you the path to enlightenment (and a debt-free degree!). plus, some partnerships even give scholarships for kilometer based travel, so you can come study with us from Gujarat to West Bengal if you wish! don't miss the application deadline at nine zero zero hours on first january two thousand and twenty five!
